tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
 customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 first_name STRING,
 last_name STRING,
 email STRING,
 phone_number STRING,
 segment STRING,
 behavior_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
 campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name STRING,
 start_date TIMESTAMP,
 end_date TIMESTAMP,
 segment STRING
)

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
 behavior_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id UUID,
 behavior_event STRING,
 event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 event_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    email STRING,
    segment STRING
)

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    behavior_type STRING,
    behavior_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name STRING,
    segment STRING
)

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_segments(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE click_data (
  click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_segments(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  communication_channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  communication_content TEXT,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_segments(customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Customer (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), segment VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE PurchaseHistory (id INT, customer_id INT, item_name VARCHAR(255), price DECIMAL(10, 2), purchase_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE BehaviorData (id INT, customer_id INT, page_views INT, interactions INT, last_visit TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE SegmentData (id INT, segment_name VARCHAR(50), segment_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE CommunicationLog (id INT, customer_id INT, communication_type VARCHAR(50), sent_date TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(50));
